Package ca.concordia.risk.game

Class Country

java.lang.Object
ca.concordia.risk.game.Country
public class Country
extends java.lang.Object
This class is the representation of the game country.
Author:
Enrique

    • addNeighbor

      public boolean addNeighbor​(Country p_country)
      Adds a neighbor to the country, representing a border.
      Parameters:
      p_country - country to be added as a neighbor.
      Returns:
      true if the neighbor was added.
      false if the neighbor already existed.

    • removeNeighbor

      public boolean removeNeighbor​(Country p_country)
      Removes a neighbor from the country.
      Parameters:
      p_country - country to be removed from the set of neighbors.
      Returns:
      true if the neighbor was removed.
      false if p_country was not a neighbor.

    • hasNeighbor

      public boolean hasNeighbor​(Country p_country)
      Check if the a country is a neighbor of this country.
      Parameters:
      p_country - country to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the p_country is a neighbor of the this country.
      false if p_country is not a neighbor.

    • setOwner

      public void setOwner​(Player p_owner)
      Sets the player owning this country.
      Parameters:
      p_owner - player owning the country.

    • addArmies

      public void addArmies​(int p_armies)
      Adds armies to the country.
      Parameters:
      p_armies - positive integer representing the number of armies to add.

    • removeArmies

      public void removeArmies​(int p_armies)
      Removes armies from the country.
      Parameters:
      p_armies - positive integer representing the number of armies to remove.
